title: Special-Rcology

No problem! Itâ€™s very easy, really. To get started, watch this video for 2 minutes and youâ€™re good to go!
Hereâ€™s a transcript of what to do: 1. Create a github account here! 2. Go to the projectâ€™s website repository. 3. Fork it by clicking the button on the top right! 4. After linking the forked repo to your account, clone/download the files at your desired destination using:
git clone 

Now youâ€™re good to go! Change/Add files/notes using Quarto. Check out this article for authoring content or this for learning the basics of markdown!

title: The Idea
text:
The aim of this site is simple:
Gather up useful information on R, Ecology and Statistics here.
Use it as a â€œcheat sheetâ€ or digital garden for basic knowledge.
You can help by participating or pointing out mistakes by commenting.
